game.name: Wrong Bullet
game.shortDescription: 잘못된 총알은 적의 머리에 대한 당신의 피 묻은 캠페인을 동반,사방에 흩어져 임의의 무기로 끊임없이 변화하는 세계를 공개 매혹적인 진정 사수입니다. 게임 플레이의 더 많은 측면을 발견,캐릭터의 잠금을 해제하기 위해 그들로부터 황금 파편을 수집합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wrong Bullet is a captivating chill shooter that unveils an ever-changing world with random weapons scattered everywhere, accompanying your bloody campaign against enemy heads. Collect golden shards from them to unlock characters, discovering even more facets of gameplay.

reviewHighlights.text: Wrong Bullet is a real find for fans of dynamic shooters with elements of chance. every game is unique. The characters and setting make the game indes...
Exciting battles, frenzied dynamics, you need to be constantly on the lookout to stay alive. Nice pixel graphics and stylistics.
